ComicInfo.Summary:
New stories for Judge Dredd and Captain Klep, this prog plus all-new thrills The VCs and The Stainless Steel Rat (adapted from Harry Harrison's book of the same name).
Cover: Bill Le-Fevre (Star Trek the Motion Picture - U.S.S. Enterprise)
Judge Dredd - The Black Plague (part 1) (John Wagner - Ron Smith - Tom Frame)The VCs (part 1) (Gerry Finley-Day - Mick McMahon - Steve Potter)Captain Klep - Lord Klep (part 1) (Dave Angus - Robin Smith)The Stainless Steel Rat - Stainless Steel Rat (part 1) (Kelvin Gosnell - Carlos Ezquerra)The Mind of Wolfie Smith - Night of the Carnivore (part 9) (Tom Tully - Vanyo - John Aldrich)Black Hawk (part 13) (Alan Grant - Massimo Belardinelli - Peter Knight)Starlord's Guide to the Galaxy - collectable cut-out booklet (part 1 - featuring Kleggs) (art: Dave Gibbons and Brian Bolland)
